page.title: 07S.C.A.P.
page.content: {Salfords Community Aid Project}started in 1977.It is a charity committed to helping the poor of the world.In 1985 SCAP is involved in eight overseas projects which help people to help {themselves:1.ANGWALI,a}tribal village in Bihar,India-providing drinking {water,seeds,bullocks.2.ANGWALI:eye camp with Royal Commonwealth Institute For Blind,financed by SCAP.{3.SAIDPUR Health clinic,Bangladash, for Mother/ Baby/ Child care, Vaccination TB programme.{4.MOBILE CRECHE BOMBAY}19 children looked after.{5.TREES}in {TANZANIA}-tree nursery for timber,fuel and fruit.{6.MWANGI MASHI, TANZANIA: sewing materials,school equipment and educational toys to sister Ceni. 7. {LIZ CROSS in SRI LANKA}working in reception rooms for abandon children {8.KLONG TOEY slum project, BANGKOK.
